overview: Amir Biran has over 17 years of executive management and international sales experience, in both start-up and publicly traded high-tech companies. From 1998 to 2003, Amir served as CEO of Viola Networks, and from 1994 to 1998 as vice president of sales for Better On-Line Solutions (NASDAQ: BOSC). Prior to that, Amir gained extensive experience managing the development, implementation and sales of ERP systems during his eight years at Elbit Systems (NASDAQ: ESLT). Amir has managed the launch of high-tech companies from the idea stage into successful business in the global market. He has a proven record of accomplishment in successful business development efforts with leading communication technology companies in numerous countries.
